page.title: 20RECREATION
page.content: This area has been researched by 4 members of {Ovingham Womens Institute} {Mrs.Pat Stott}coordinated the project and did the writing up and computer work. {Mrs Audrey Angus}drove us around the area {Mrs Edna Baggaley and Mrs Judith {Montgomery}helped by giving me the benefit of their local knowledge and map reading skills on forays into our area. We now feel that our knowledge of the area and its joys and problems has greatly increased.I have also enjoyed learning how to use a computer,and have over come my fear of it. The boundry of the area surveyed is about 4 km.from{Ovingham.}I would like to thank the local population especia_ lly the farmers, and my husband{ {Michael}who took the slides.
